title: New Way To Get Orange Essence
body: Hey i think that when you level up and get your capsule you should also get a range of 50-100 orange essence too. I recently got a skin shard that cost too much Orange essence then i can pay and you can't buy orange essence and when you disenchant other skins i gives you around 200-250 oe and skins are hard to come by. that is why i think we should implement a new way of getting orange essence.
